trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from DiscoveryEndpointProvider to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>Klasy używa klasy pochodzące od DiscoveryEndpointProvider w celu uzyskania odnajdowania punktu końcowego.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the GetDiscoveryEndpoint method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>Klasa wywołuje metodę GetDiscoveryEndpoint <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>wystąpienia przekazane przez użytkownika w celu pobrania <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>odnajdywania usług.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls GetDiscoveryEndpoint method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>również wywołuje metodę GetDiscoveryEndpoint, gdy musi klonowanie się.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>
